text: Hauts-de-France is an administrative region of France. It was created in 2016. It was created by combining the former regions of Nord-Pas-de-Calais and Picardy. The capital of the r√©gion is Lille. Nord-Pas-de-Calais-Picardy was the temporary name for the region. Category:2016 establishments in France
title: Hauts-de-France
